trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around July 31st 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsbegan seeing sphere objects around the end of july was sitting on my deck with my girlfriend and it was a nice evening and very clear starlit sky when i noticed an object moving from the south to north direction i have a very good view from my deck so i had my binoculars with me.the object was orange in color but seemed lit from inside by what iooked almost like an led type of light.i knew it was not an airplane,no flashing marker lights,and made no noise that i could hear.i knew for sure when the object stopped,disappeared,reappeared and continued on a northbound course.about 15 min later i saw another moving from the west this one was greenish,same size and moving about the same speed.it was hard to judge altitude but it looked to be about the same as the jets i see flying over im guessing between 10 20 thousand maybe.i seen maybe 15 of these objects between late july and sept.i actualy seen two that looked like they were racing each other.by the way my girlfriend also witnessed several of these.the speed of these seem to be alittle faster than the airliners i see what do they cruise at? maybe four or five hundred mph?.i noticed one in my telescope looking at jupiter about a month ago,it was way out there because i couldnt find it in my binocs.just wondering if anybody knows what or if they have seen these.one more thing,there is an episode on paranormal state where they investagated lights in washington state.what they were looking at is very simular to what i was seeing here.
